participant_id.Description: Unique BIDS identifier for the participant in this study.

subjectkey.Description: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject

src_subject_id.Description: Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project

interview_date.Description: Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY

interview_age.Description: Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging. | Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

sex.Description: Sex of subject at birth | M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

eventname.Description: The event name for which the data was collected

tfmri_sst_beh_performflag.Description: Whether the participant had an acceptable performance in the task; all trial types must yield more than 3 events for both positive and negative feedback | 1= acceptable; 0= not acceptable

tfmri_sst_nbeh_nruns.Description: Number of valid runs in the file

tfmri_sst_r1_beh_go_nt.Description: Total number of "Go" trials in run 1

tfmri_sst_r1_beh_s_nt.Description: Total number of "Stop" trials in run 1

tfmri_sst_r2_beh_go_nt.Description: Total number of "Go" trials in run 2

tfmri_sst_r2_beh_s_nt.Description: Total number of "Stop" trials in run 2

tfmri_sst_r1_beh_crgo_nt.Description: Total number of correct "Go" trials in run 1

tfmri_sst_r2_beh_crgo_nt.Description: Total number of correct "Go" trials in run 2

tfmri_sst_r1_beh_crgo_rt.Description: Rate of correct "Go" trials in run 1

tfmri_sst_r2_beh_crgo_rt.Description: Rate of correct "Go" trials in run 2

tfmri_sst_all_beh_crgo_mrt.Description: Mean response time for all correct "Go" trials

tfmri_sst_all_beh_crgo_stdrt.Description: Standard deviation of response times for all correct "Go" trials

tfmri_sst_r1_beh_crgo_mrt.Description: Mean response time for all correct "Go" trials in run 1

tfmri_sst_r1_beh_crgo_stdrt.Description: Standard deviation of response times for all correct "Go" trials in run 1

tfmri_sst_r2_beh_crgo_mrt.Description: Mean response time for all correct "Go" trials in run 2

tfmri_sst_r2_beh_crgo_stdrt.Description: Standard deviation of response times for all correct "Go" trials in run 2

tfmri_sst_all_beh_crlg_nt.Description: Total number of "Go" trials that were correctly answered late

tfmri_sst_r1_beh_crlg_nt.Description: Total number of "Go" trials that were correctly answered late in run 1

tfmri_sst_r2_beh_crlg_nt.Description: Total number of "Go" trials that were correctly answered late in run 2

tfmri_sst_all_beh_crlg_rt.Description: Rate of correct "Go" trials answered late

tfmri_sst_r1_beh_crlg_rt.Description: Rate of correct "Go" trials answered late in run 1

tfmri_sst_r2_beh_crlg_rt.Description: Rate of correct "Go" trials answered late in run 2

tfmri_sst_all_beh_crlg_mrt.Description: Mean response time for all correct but late "Go" trials

tfmri_sst_all_beh_crlg_stdrt.Description: Standard deviation of response times for all correct but late "Go" trials

tfmri_sst_r1_beh_crlg_mrt.Description: Mean response time for all correct but late "Go" trials in run 1

tfmri_sst_r1_beh_crlg_stdrt.Description: Standard deviation of response times for all correct but late "Go" trials in run 1

tfmri_sst_r2_beh_crlg_mrt.Description: Mean response time for all correct but late "Go" trials in run 2

tfmri_sst_r2_beh_crlg_stdrt.Description: Standard deviation of response times for all correct but late "Go" trials in run 2

tfmri_sst_all_beh_incrgo_nt.Description: Total number of "Go" trials that were answered incorrectly

tfmri_sst_r1_beh_incrgo_nt.Description: Total number of "Go" trials that were answered incorrectly in run 1

tfmri_sst_r2_beh_incrgo_nt.Description: Total number of "Go" trials that were answered incorrectly in run 2

tfmri_sst_all_beh_incrgo_rt.Description: Rate of "Go" trials that were answered incorrectly

tfmri_sst_r1_beh_incrgo_rt.Description: Rate of "Go" trials that were answered incorrectly in run 1

tfmri_sst_r2_beh_incrgo_rt.Description: Rate of "Go" trials that were answered incorrectly in run 2

tfmri_sst_all_beh_incrgo_mrt.Description: Mean response time for all incorrect "Go" trials

tfmri_sst_all_beh_incrgo_stdrt.Description: Standard deviation of response times for all incorrect "Go" trials

tfmri_sst_r1_beh_incrgo_mrt.Description: Mean response time for all incorrect "Go" trials in run 1

tfmri_sst_r1_beh_incrgo_stdrt.Description: Standard deviation of response times for all incorrect "Go" trials in run 1

tfmri_sst_r2_beh_incrgo_mrt.Description: Mean response time for all incorrect "Go" trials in run 2

tfmri_sst_r2_beh_incrgo_stdrt.Description: Standard deviation of response times for all incorrect "Go" trials in run 2

tfmri_sst_all_beh_incrlg_nt.Description: Total number of "Go" trials that were correctly answered incorrectly and late

tfmri_sst_r1_beh_incrlg_nt.Description: Total number of "Go" trials that were answered incorrectly and late in run 1

tfmri_sst_r2_beh_incrlg_nt.Description: Total number of "Go" trials that were answered incorrectly and late in run 2

tfmri_sst_all_beh_incrlg_rt.Description: Rate of incorrect and late "Go" trials

tfmri_sst_r1_beh_incrlg_rt.Description: Rate of incorrect and late "Go" trials in run 1

tfmri_sst_r2_beh_incrlg_rt.Description: Rate of incorrect and late "Go" trials in run 2

tfmri_sst_all_beh_incrlg_mrt.Description: Mean response time for all incorrect and late "Go" trials

tfmri_sst_all_beh_incrlg_stdrt.Description: Standard deviation of response times for all incorrect but late "Go" trials

tfmri_sst_r1_beh_incrlg_mrt.Description: Mean response time for all incorrect and late "Go" trials in run 1

tfmri_sst_r1_beh_incrlg_stdrt.Description: Standard deviation of response times for all incorrect but late "Go" trials in run 1

tfmri_sst_r2_beh_incrlg_mrt.Description: Mean response time for all incorrect and late "Go" trials in run 2

tfmri_sst_r2_beh_incrlg_stdrt.Description: Standard deviation of response times for all incorrect and late "Go" trials in run 2

tfmri_sst_r1_beh_nrgo_nt.Description: Total number of "Go" trials unanswered in run 1

tfmri_sst_r2_beh_nrgo_nt.Description: Total number of "Go" trials unanswered in run 2

tfmri_sst_r1_beh_nrgo_rt.Description: Rate of "Go" trials unanswered in run 1

tfmri_sst_r2_beh_nrgo_rt.Description: Rate of "Go" trials unanswered in run 2

tfmri_sst_r1_beh_crs_nt.Description: Total number of correct "Stop" trials in run 1

tfmri_sst_r2_beh_crs_nt.Description: Total number of correct "Stop" trials in run 2

tfmri_sst_r1_beh_crs_rt.Description: Rate of correct "Stop" trials in run 1

tfmri_sst_r2_beh_crs_rt.Description: Rate of correct "Stop" trials in run 2

tfmri_sst_all_beh_incrs_nt.Description: Total number of "Stop" trials answered incorrectly

tfmri_sst_r1_beh_incrs_nt.Description: Total number of "Stop" trials answered incorrectly in run 1

tfmri_sst_r2_beh_incrs_nt.Description: Total number of "Stop" trials answered incorrectly in run 2

tfmri_sst_r1_beh_incrs_rt.Description: Rate of "Stop" trials answered incorrectly in run 1

tfmri_sst_r2_beh_incrs_rt.Description: Rate of "Stop" trials answered incorrectly in run 2

tfmri_sst_all_beh_incrs_mrt.Description: Mean response time for all incorrect "Stop" trials

tfmri_sst_all_beh_incrs_stdrt.Description: Standard deviation of response times for all incorrect "Stop" trials

tfmri_sst_r1_beh_incrs_mrt.Description: Mean response time for all incorrect "Stop" trials in run 1

tfmri_sst_r1_beh_incrs_stdrt.Description: Standard deviation of response times for all incorrect "Stop" trials in run 1

tfmri_sst_r2_beh_incrs_mrt.Description: Mean response time for all incorrect "Stop" trials in run 2

tfmri_sst_r2_beh_incrs_stdrt.Description: Standard deviation of response times for all incorrect "Stop" trials in run 2

tfmri_sst_all_beh_ssds_nt.Description: Total number of "Stop" trials that were answered before the "Stop" signal was presented

tfmri_sst_r1_beh_ssds_nt.Description: Total number of "Stop" trials that were answered before the "Stop" signal was presented in run 1

tfmri_sst_r2_beh_ssds_nt.Description: Total number of "Stop" trials that were answered before the "Stop" signal was presented in run 2

tfmri_sst_all_beh_ssds_rt.Description: Rate of "Stop" trials that were answered before the "Stop" signal was presented

tfmri_sst_r1_beh_ssds_rt.Description: Rate of "Stop" trials that were answered before the "Stop" signal was presented in run 1

tfmri_sst_r2_beh_ssds_rt.Description: Rate of "Stop" trials that were answered before the "Stop" signal was presented in run 2

tfmri_sst_all_beh_tot_mssd.Description: Mean stop signal delay for all "Stop" trials

tfmri_sst_all_beh_total_mssrt.Description: Stop Signal Reaction Time, mean estimation

tfmri_sst_all_beh_total_issrt.Description: Stop Signal Reaction Time, integration estimation

tfmri_sst_beh_violatorflag.Description: Race model violators where Stop Fail RT > Go RT

tfmri_sst_beh_0ssdcount.Description: Number of Stop trials with 0ms SSD
